{{ file?.fileName }} {{ file?.folder }} {{ file?.folderId }}
No files
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UploadFileService } from '../services/upload-file.service'; import { ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'], }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { ngOnInit(): void { } let picker: HTMLElement | null = document.getElementById("picker"); let listing: HTMLElement | null = document.getElementById("listing"); if (picker && listing) { picker.addEventListener("change", (e: Event) => { let target = e.target as HTMLInputElement; console.log(target.files); for (let file of Array.from(target.files)) { let item = document.createElement("li"); item.textContent = file.webkitRelativePath; listing.appendChild(item); } }); } }
